mapper.select: select plan.*,d.departmentName,p.positionName from hr_recruit_plan plan left join department d on plan.departmentId=d.departmentId left join position p on plan.positionId=p.positionId

select plan.*,p.positionName,d.departmentName,u.id,u.uname from hr_recruit_plan plan left join Position p on plan.positionId=p.positionId left join department d on plan.departmentId=d.departmentId left join users u on plan.id=u.id where PLAN_No=#{planNo}
mapper.update: update hr_recruit_plan set PLAN_NAME=#{planName},departmentId=#{departmentId},positionId=#{positionId}, PLAN_RECR_NO=#{planRecrNo},PLAN_DITCH=#{planDitch},PLAN_BCWS=#{planBcws}, START_DATE=#{startDate},END_DATE=#{endDate},WORK_DATE=#{workDate},SALARY_AREA=#{salaryArea}, POSITION_REQUIRE=#{positionRequire},RECRUIT_DIRECTION=#{recruitDirection}, RECRUIT_REMARK=#{recruitRemark},REGISTER_TIME=#{registerTime},ATTACHMENT_NAME=#{attachmentName}, PLAN_STATUS=#{planStatus},id=#{id} where PLAN_No=#{planNo}
